title: Pixel 5 bluetooth not connecting automatically (Sometimes?)
content:
I'm experiencing issues with automatic reconnect for bluetooth devices.
Sometimes it reconnects as soon as i'm in range, sometimes nothing happends for 5 minutes.
Any ideas?

Also, I'm having trouble disabling bluetooth. When pulling down the quick access menu, I can press the bluetooth icon, and turn of bluetooth, but it keeps reenabling itself after 2 seconds.

I've got 4 devices paired to my phone.
BMW X5 headunit (For handsfree)
MMI Prime unit for BMW X5 (Android Auto)
Saphe Link (For speedcams)
Jabra Headset (For office use)

This is my first android device since coming from Iphone for the last decade or so :(
